name: SillyTavern System
mes: Group chat created. Say 'Hi' to lovely people!

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
original_avatar: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus.png
mes:
Despite being the only one social enough of her siblings to deal with potential clients and the day to day operations of Cerberus Security, Cassia fucking hated meetings. 

She only half paid attention, the droning techno-babble of her younger brother Damien was starting to turn into an annoying buzz. She could care less what he was talking about, she’d always sign off on it; this meeting for more for their investors and their highest paying clients. The eldest of them, Marcus, shared an equally annoying glance her way, the vein bulging in his forehead getting thicker by the second. Though she suspected it was directed more towards her than their brother, noticing his glance always flicking towards their pet. Well *her pet*, at least for today. 

And what a good little pup you were being. 

Cassia let her eyes drift downward to where you were kneeling at her feet, looking so fucking pretty in your shiny new leather collar with your head in her lap. Her slender fingers reach down, hooking beneath the collar to direct your face upward to look at her. “Look at you..” She cooed softly, smirking at the way your eyes lit up at her praises, “..being so good for me.” 

Her hands traveled up to run through your hair, ruffling it slightly. “Does pretty pup want a reward for being so good, hm?” All Cass wanted in this very moment was to you whimpering and writhing beneath until you begged for more.

*Hells this meeting couldn’t end fast enough.*

name: Marcus Infernus, The Left Head of Cerberus
original_avatar: Marcus Infernus, The Left Head of Cerberus.png
mes:
Marcus Infernus, left head of Cerberus and oldest of his siblings, was a man of few pleasures and fewer emotions. But one thing-- or rather a person he couldn’t help indulging himself in, was Hailee. 

“Fucking louder pup, I don’t think the boys can hear you..” Marcus growled low in your ear.

Currently his large hand was fisted into your hair, holding your bent body at a sharp angle against the window of his office; the other arm wrapped around your waist as he continued to slam into you from behind. An occurrence that was getting more and more common as of late the more you kept agreeing to come to his office, and his bed. He would be lying if he didn’t say he loved seeing you like this, loved displaying how good and obedient you were for him. It almost made him feel something for more for you in his hardened heart, *almost*. For now, he was definitely feeling you around his hardened cock. 

“Maybe we should open the window?” He grunted between thrusts, the hand in her hair momentarily releasing its grip to roughly slap against your ass. “Then they’ll really know who this perfect ass belongs to.” Marcus couldn’t help but smirk at the way your walls tensed around him, the pleading look in your eyes (whether that may be for him to actually open the window or not, he couldn’t say) as you looked back at him over your shoulder. *Fucking delicious..*. “Mmm I’d bet you like that huh? Having the whole company see you getting *fucked*.”

Having the whole company see you getting *fucked*.”

name: Damien Infernus, The Right Head of Cerberus
original_avatar: Damien Infernus, The Right Head of Cerberus.png
mes:
Damien Infernus was always a whimpering mess when it came to you. He didn’t care if his siblings saw his relationship with you pathetic, or that they held a more dominant and firm hand with you. To him, you were more divine than any of those demigodded fucks that flounced around New Olympus. 

While his siblings controlled you, you controlled him. His days were spent staring at screens, brain running at over a thousand miles a minute with the amount of information he had to keep track of. Send this team here, hack into this system there, write all new code for a new facial recognition AI; it was exhausting. But you helped his brain slow down, helped him to shut down and stop thinking. 

“More-- please give me more, I-I’ll be so good, such a good boy for you.” He whined, icy blue eyes wide and begging. Damien struggled against the ties that kept his hands bound behind his back, scooting on his knees to grovel at your feet. He couldn’t help but press his face against your thighs, nuzzling against them like the greedy dog that he was. Such a pathetic boy for his Hailee. 

He gave an almost delighted yelp as you brought the tassel whip against his chest for the hundredth time that night, his pale skin littered with deliciously red welts and marks. “Thank you, Hailee.” He moaned, kissing across your thighs, down your calves and to the tops of feet.
